text:
I noticed three typos while reading through the short manual.
Here are the corrections.

It __offeres__ several advantages. => It offers several advantages.

log output can be saved in ____ persistent medium => log output can be saved in 
a persistent medium

a __sufficiently rich__ logging package => a sufficiently-rich logging package
creator: mkienenb@gmail.com

text: Thanks, all changes applied and updated on the website.
creator: paul.smith@lawlex.com.au
